PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-09002021-09-01,  HC,  PHAC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActQuarantine Act
SubjectOrder Amending the Minimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order (Prohibition of Entry into Canada from any Country Other than the United States)
PrecisOrder amending the MINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER (PROHIBITION OF ENTRY INTO CANADA FROM ANY COUNTRY OTHER THAN THE UNITED STATES) in order to permit authorized foreign national travellers and crew entry into Canada regardless of whether they have reasonable grounds to suspect they have COVID-19, if they exhibit signs and symptoms of COVID-19, or if they have COVID-19 when arriving by a Government of Canada-arranged evacuation.
AttachmentsAttachment
